title: Details emerge around Unity’s fee changes after outcry
description:
Details have emerged regarding the proposed changes to Unity’s controversial per-install fee plan for developers. These changes come in response to the outcry and concerns raised within the game development community about Unity’s recently announced new fee structure potentially bankrupting developers. Bloomberg reporter Jason Schreier, known for his in-depth coverage of the gaming industry, has... Read more »

The post Details emerge around Unity’s fee changes after outcry appeared first on Developer Tech News.
